plugins.photosPermission: The app needs access to your photos to set your profile picture.

infoPlist.NSHealthShareUsageDescription: This app reads your step count data.
infoPlist.NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription: This app updates your step count data.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to your photo library to upload profile pictures.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs access to your camera to take profile pictures.
